juding_criteria:
To satisfy the Key Requirement ("The image must be the result of accurately modifying the conditional image according to the instruction") and the specific prompt ("Replace the potted plants on the table with delicious food"), the final image must contain the following visual elements:

*   Delicious food on the round wooden table
*   Round wooden table
*   Two yellow chairs
*   Grey tiled balcony floor
*   Glass and black metal balcony railing
*   Distant cityscape and greenery view beyond the railing
*   Sliding glass door on the left side of the balcony
*   Wall-mounted planter with flowers on the left wall (not on the table)
*   Large leafy potted plant behind the chairs (not on the table)
*   Wooden planter box with flowers along the railing (not on the table)
*   Wooden A-frame plant stand with various potted plants (not on the table)
*   Two cacti in pots on the floor (not on the table)
*   Balcony ceiling with a rectangular light fixture
